Description: Monitor and manage daily project activities. Operate and manage all the related contractual and commercial issues with clients, contractors and suppliers. Determine and distribute the workload of project Monitor and do the necessary follow up to ensure the earliest approval of the Engineering submittals Manage and conduct the technical and commercial workshops, attending meetings with project’s official’s contractors and suppliers. Determine and manage the required reports to monitor and evaluate the project progress. Direct the planning department for procurement production and installation program Operate, control and monitor project team performance and their productivity. Follow-up for monthly payment applications and payments. Timely submit variations and follow-up for approvals Follow-up site QA/QC and safety procedure as per site requirements Maintain a safe and clean working environment at site by enforcing procedures, rules and regulations. Requirements Minimum 5 Years’ experience in Joinery/Interior Fitout Works Bachelor‘s Degree in Architecture/ Mechanical / Civil Engineering Plus training courses.  Certificate in project Management/Contract Management is an Advantage Benefits Salary Upto AED15000/- Subject to experience and competencies. Family Benefits Paid Leave Medical Insurance Travel TicketJob Details
